headline: 3M Company (MMM): Among the Biggest Dividend Cuts and Suspensions of 2024
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Biggest Dividend Cuts and Suspensions of 2024. In this article, we are going to take a look at where 3M Company (NYSE:MMM) stands against the other stocks. Dividends hold great appeal for investors—they appreciate receiving them and strongly dislike reductions. Despite this, numerous major companies have reduced their […]
